news_title: Hyperliquid's HIP-3 Module Launch Spurs DeFi Ecosystem Growth
news_subtitle: Hyperliquid launches HIP-3 on its mainnet, expanding DeFi growth. This innovation facilitates the creation of permissionless perpetual DEX markets, influencing the trading volume and competitive landscape. Read original article on tokentopnews.com

news_title: Hyperliquid and SUI dominate $585M upcoming token unlocks
news_subtitle: Over $585M in crypto token unlocks are scheduled from Dec. 29–Jan. 5, led by Hyperliquid, SUI, RAIN, and Solana.

news_title: Russia tests retail crypto access under strict caps and ruble-only rule
news_subtitle: Russia plans capped crypto trading for retail investors, strict oversight for intermediaries, and a phased digital ruble rollout through 2028. Russia’s central bank has proposed regulations that would allow non-qualified investors to trade limited cryptocurrencies, according to a...
